name: Aruk Thundercaller Thuunlakalaga

trait.name: Mountain Born
text: Aruk is acclimated to high altitude, including elevations above 20,000 feet.

trait.name: Powerful Build
text: Aruk counts as one size larger when determining his carrying capacity and the weight he can push, drag, or lift.

action.name: Multiattack
text: Aruk makes two attacks with his greataxe or hurls two javelins.

action.name: Greataxe
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (1d12 + 4) slashing damage.

action.name: Javelin
text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Stone's Endurance (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
text: When Aruk takes damage, it reduces the damage taken by 9 (1d12 + 3).

description:
Goliaths inhabit the Spine of the World, where their mettle is tested against orcs, ogres, frost giants, remorhazes, ice trolls, young white dragons, the treacherous mountain terrain, and the cruel indifference of nature.
Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden p. 169
